product_name: Sea to Summit Head Net with Insect Shield
long_description: When the bugs are swarming, the Sea To Summit head net with Insect Shield(R) is the key to keeping comfortable in the outdoors. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Soft polyester mesh fabric blocks bugs; black mesh offers better visibility than white mesh. Head net is sized to wear with or without a hat. Elasticized draw cord creates a seal to keep bugs from getting in. The Sea To Summit head net with Insect Shield(R) comes packaged in its own small stuff sack; hat not included.
short_description: When the bugs are swarming, the Sea To Summit head net with Insect Shield(R) is the key to keeping comfortable in the outdoors.
